info.brief_description: Joe is permanently trapped in the body of a female member of his family.
info.description:
Joe Mason has just moved into the Mason Mansion, located on Mason road. His family has owned the road and all the houses on it for 50 years. Joe and his family were forced to move there after selling their house due to low income from both his parents. Now, he will have to live in a creepy old house, with all his neighbors being close family members. His grandparents, who own all the houses, have offered Joe's family the mansion to stay in free of charge, as they have with the rest of the Mason Family. Joe personally thought that being near family all the time wasn't so bad, he did love them after all, but he wondered if he would ever have a moment to himself. Unlucky for Joe, the term "Himself" was about to become hard to define.

Characters(in order on house)
The Mason Mansion
Joe Mason: 16 year old creative and adventurous teenager. Usually likes trying new things and gets along with most people. He's very generous and pretty smart. He enjoys videogames and biking.
Jessica Mason: Joe's 18 year old pessimistic, but hardworking sister. Joe and Jessica often get into fights but usuallly they get over it. At the end of the day they love each other. She's trying to earn enough money to pay her way through medical school, and does anything to get the money. She tells her parents she has the night shift at the local Wendy's but is secretly stripping.
Francesca Mason: Joe's 40 year old loving mother. Joe and Francesca's relationship is more of friends than mother and son. Joe's Dad see's this as inappropriate but Francesca doesn't really care. She will love her son anyway she pleases. She has stayed in good shape since she gave birth to Jessica and Joe's friends in his old town would often check her out. This bothers Joe a little but not enough to stop loving his mom. She works as a fitness instructor.
Gregory Mason: Joe's 42 year old stern father. Joe's father is the only person in his family he can't relate to. Everything they like is so vastly different. Differences aside, they still love each other. Even after 21 years of marriage, Greg still finds time to please his wife, annoyingly loud in Joe's perspective. Like his wife, he has kept in very good shape. He works as police officer.

The Mason Abode
Mallory Mason: Joe's 33 year old wild aunt. Mallory used to be Joe's dad's wild and crazy sister. She used to be the partier of the family until she got pregnant 7 monthes ago. Now she is married to the father and living in the only place she knew was fit for a baby:Mason road. Joe used to have a huge crush on his aunt Mallory and he thought he would feel different once he saw her pregnant, but she still looked really hot to him. She is currently unemployed.
Jack Stevenson: Joe's 30 year old (kind of) uncle. He was just another one of Malloy's sexual adventures, until he realised he was going to be a father. He immediatly offered to do anything he could to help Mallory with the baby and Jack eventually became the noble boyfriend. Mallory hasn't had a serious relationship in a while but this seemed right to her. Not many in the Mason family thinks he will be here forever, but Joe trusts him. Even though she is pregnant, Mallory and Jack still have urges and give itno them often. Jack is in charge of his own auto repair shop.

The Mason Castle
George Mason: Joe's 70 grump grandfather. Although it would seem he is the head of the family, he is in fact not even really a mason. His forced him to take her maiden name. He feels like he has no power at all and usually pouts at family gatherings. He is only happy when he gets his Viagra. His wife is certainly fine with that. He is currently retired.
Clara Mason: Joe's 63 year old over-acheiving Grandmother. Clara thought her life was over once she got pregnant at 14 with her first child, but she prevailed. she invested wisely in the right companies and became a millionaire by the age of 20. She then continued to have more children with her husband George. She is very loving of her family and her family loves her. She is incredible beautiful despite her age and is still frisky in the bedroom. she is currently retired.

The Mason Residence

Joe would happily say that Jill is one of his best friends and would trust her with anything. Jill is currently in a solid lesbian relationship. Her landlord didn't approve and kicked her out of her apartment. Her parents, who didn't really like her lifestyle either but loved her anyways, offered her a home for Jill and her girlfriend. If Joe had just met Jill he would never guess that she was almost 50, she is still stunning. She currently works as a lawer.

Jill told Joe that "She was just worried no one would like her, since she got me kicked out of my apartment". She's very pretty and really loves music. She currently works as a socila worker.

She was completly crushed and hasn't been the same since. Even though she is just an in-law, Joe's Grandparents offered her to live in a new house away from all the bad memories. Although still depressed sometimes, she has gotten a lot better and has been seen smiling. She is currently unemployed.

She insists that her mother take a break off working and live off Suzy's own income. All of the Mason family feels very proud of Suzy for her intense generosity and love for her mother. She currently works as a lingerie model.
